name: ClassBuilder.AnnotationBuilder
description: The ClassBuilder.AnnotationBuilder class is a fluent builder for adding and configuring annotations on classes, methods, fields, and constructors within the ClassBuilder system.
overview:
The `ClassBuilder.AnnotationBuilder` class is a fluent builder for adding and configuring annotations on classes, methods, fields, and constructors within the ClassBuilder system. This builder provides a convenient API for setting annotation properties, including primitive values, strings, enums, arrays, and nested annotations.

AnnotationBuilder instances are obtained through various annotation-related methods in the ClassBuilder system and allow you to construct complex annotation structures with multiple properties and nested annotations.

methods.name: putString
methods.description: Sets a string property value on the annotation.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the annotation property

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The string value to set

methods.name: putInt
methods.description: Sets an integer property value on the annotation.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the annotation property

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The integer value to set

methods.name: putLong
methods.description: Sets a long property value on the annotation.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the annotation property

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The long value to set

methods.name: putDouble
methods.description: Sets a double property value on the annotation.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the annotation property

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The double value to set

methods.name: putFloat
methods.description: Sets a float property value on the annotation.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the annotation property

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The float value to set

methods.name: putBoolean
methods.description: Sets a boolean property value on the annotation.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the annotation property

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The boolean value to set

methods.name: putByte
methods.description: Sets a byte property value on the annotation.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the annotation property

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The byte value to set

methods.name: putShort
methods.description: Sets a short property value on the annotation.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the annotation property

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The short value to set

methods.name: putChar
methods.description: Sets a char property value on the annotation.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the annotation property

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The char value to set (single character string)

methods.name: putClass
methods.description: Sets a Class property value on the annotation.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the annotation property

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The Class object to set

methods.name: putEnum
methods.description: Sets an enum property value on the annotation.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the annotation property

parameters.name: enumClass
parameters.description: The enum class

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The enum constant name

methods.name: putArray
methods.description: Creates an array property builder for the specified property name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the array property

methods.name: putNested
methods.description: Creates a nested annotation builder for the specified property.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the nested annotation property

parameters.name: annotationType
parameters.description: The annotation type

methods.name: finish
methods.description: Finalizes the annotation and returns to the parent builder. This method must be called to apply the annotation to the target element.
